text: we know that analytics are important for
your business but building a data
warehouse has always been way too
complicated and expensive most data
warehouses are complex can often take
months to set up and can cost you
millions of dollars in software and
hardware expenses and that's before you
even start using it then once you've
made the investment and you're finally
set up you have to hire a bunch of DBAs
to make sure your queries aren't fast
and data isn't ever lost and traditional
data warehouses don't scale up or down
easily
so when data volumes grow you have to
choose between slow query performance or
time and effort on an extensive upgrade
process what if you can replace all of
this complex software and hardware with
the data warehouse service that's easy
to use fast and cost effective
introducing Amazon redshift a fast and
powerful petabyte scale data warehouse
service that's fully managed making it
easy for you to set up operate and scale
Amazon redshift is very easy to use it
seamlessly integrates with all of the
existing popular BI tools there are no
new languages to learn you just load up
your cluster connect your favorite query
tool and you're ready to go in addition
to being easy to query reshet is also
easy to manage that's because it's a
data warehouse service that handles all
of the management activities for you for
example let's say you need a data
warehouse to store all of your sales
data for a particular region all you
have to do is log on to the AWS
management console and with a few clicks
you can have a fully operational data
warehouse to get started you simply pick
a node with pre allocated storage you
can start with a few hundred gigabytes
and scale up to a petabyte or more for
under $1,000 per terabyte per year
Amazon redshift then takes care of the
rest automatically and within minutes
you'll have your own data warehouse up
and running ready to accept data as your
business grows and your data warehouse
needs to grow with it you can easily
scale without any downtime just add more
nodes and redshift automatically adds
those nodes to your cluster and
redistributes your data for maximum
performance
there's no tuning needed to maintain
performance or speed we handle all that
for you
Amazon red ship uses columnar storage
and a massively parallel processing
architecture two parallel lies and
distribute data and queries across
multiple nodes to consistently deliver
high performance at any volume of data
it also automatically and continuously
monitors your cluster and backs up your
data so you can restore a copy of your
data warehouse with just a few clicks
encryption is built-in just switch it on
and all your data and backups are
automatically encrypted and if you want
to use SSL or Amazon VPC that's all
built-in - oh and by the way all this
comes with a very small price tag Amazon
redshift is extremely cost effective and
as low as one tenth of the cost of
traditional data warehouse systems there
are no upfront fees you can simply pay
as you go you can choose to either pay
by the hour with no upfront commitments
using our lo on-demand rates or get up
to a 70% discount by using our reserved
instance pricing plus you can get
started with a two terabyte Amazon
redshift data warehouse cluster for less
than a dollar an hour so when you're
ready to start data warehousing the AWS
way visit our website and sign up today
you
